If cancer is in the nasal cavity, treatment may include the following:          - Surgery and/or radiation therapy.    - Chemotherapy and radiation therapy.    - A clinical trial of chemotherapy before surgery or radiation therapy.    - A clinical trial of chemotherapy after surgery or other cancer treatment.    - A clinical trial of chemother
